creditline: Gift of Mrs. W. C. MacFarlane
medium: Carved and gilded wood, gilded wire, pink marble, and glass
object_name: Bilbao mirror, one of a pair
text: This particular type of mirror, with pink marble veneer and delicate carved wood and gilded ornament, originated in Bilbao, Spain. As its popularity peaked in the late 18th century, it was produced throughout Europe, especially in Germany, Portugal, and Denmark, with many exported to the United States.
title: Bilbao mirror, one of a pair
